QuestData.Title: Raid Leader Slovan
QuestData.Description: The raiders are led by a particularly violent saurok known as Slovan. The Crane Temple usually comes to our aid when he attacks but now we find ourselves outmatched and outmaneuvered.$b$bPlease, $c, aid us by destroying this raid leader.$b$bYou can find him in his den behind the Krasari Falls.
QuestData.CompletionText: Slovan has always been a nuisance, but with the Crane Temple's defenses down he has become a true threat.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done us a great service today. On behalf of my people I thank you.$b$bPlease, accept this token of our gratitude.
